title: Dude, where's my membership?
content:
Hello Joe and Jared,   
   
It's been about a month since I signed up for my Typophile membership and even though my payment has shown up in my bank statement, I haven't heard from you, or seen my profile updated. Are you back-logged? When can I expect my membership gifts in the mail?   
   
Thanks,   
Ricardo
author: ric

comments.content: Ricardo, you'll probably get a better response by emailing Jared directly. [benson@typophile.com](mailto:benson@typophile.com)
